sections.divorceDesc: Turnkey divorce and dissolution of marriage — without your personal participation, presence, or even the consent of the second spouse. We will help you protect your interests at all stages of the process.

service1.title: Divorce without your participation
service1.desc: We will help you conduct all legal procedures — from preparing documents to representing your interests in court. You don't need to waste time and nerves — entrust the process to professionals.

service2.title: Divorce without spouse consent
service2.desc: If the second spouse does not agree or does not appear in court, we will provide competent support and protection of your interests, even if the spouse actively opposes the divorce.

service3.title: Divorce with or without children
service3.desc: We successfully handle cases with or without children. We will take on all legal issues: division of property, determination of the child's place of residence, collection of alimony. Your interests are in safe hands.

service4.title: Divorce when spouse's location is unknown
service4.desc: Even if your spouse's whereabouts are unknown, we will initiate legal proceedings, carry out all necessary procedures and achieve official dissolution of marriage without delays.

service5.title: Alimony collection
service5.desc: We will prepare a complete package of documents, analyze your income and court and ensure a fair decision. You will receive reliable protection — quickly, legally, and without unnecessary complications.

service6.title: Determining child visitation schedule
service6.desc: For parents who want to establish a clear order of meetings with the child. We will help develop a convenient and fair schedule that meets the interests of the child and achieve official dissolution of rights without delays.

adv1.title: Years of practice
adv1.desc: Legal practice experience of more than 10 years.

adv2.title: Confidentiality
adv2.desc: We guarantee complete confidentiality of your information. All data received during the work is protected and not transferred to third parties without your consent.

adv3.title: Personal approach
adv3.desc: Individual work with each client allows solving even the most complex problems.

adv4.title: Excellent service
adv4.desc: We provide quality service and value our clients.

adv5.title: Efficiency
adv5.desc: For each case, we allocate a specialist who works only with your company.

adv6.title: Benefit
adv6.desc: We have fixed prices for standard services, so you always know what you are paying for.

contact.subtitle: Choose convenient way
contact.desc: Contact me in any way and I will help solve your legal issues
